Text: <c.white><c.mono_sans>He is what I used to be,</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>as you have done in the past,</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>If both are broken, there can be</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>I have come to swear to you</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>I do not wish to insult you,</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>I swear to be true to you,</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>the one who has chosen to die.</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>no one else will take us in.</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>but so far no one has explained</c.mono_sans></c.white>
